ovdesc.p: This application is used to run the Cash Pooling on-line ,in Info mode, if the group permits. The user needs to enter the group name (id of AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM) or the sub-group name (also id of AC.CP.GROUP.PARAM).
The run is invoked by using the V (verify) function at the action line, against a list of groups or via a Desktop menu/shortcut.
